name: contest.io
description: A Web App for monitoring custom programming contests
author: Felix Wu <mail@flxwu.com>

scripts.setup: concurrently "virtualenv -p python3.6 venv && pip3 install -r requirements.txt && pip3 install -e ." "yarn install" "cd client/ && yarn install"
scripts.dev: concurrently "cd client/ && yarn serve" "FLASK_APP=server FLASK_DEBUG=1 flask run --with-threads"
